attributes.action: Make cats house bound or only able to roam the streets wearing a collar and lead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make cats house bound or only able to roam the streets wearing a collar and lead. This will stop unwanted cats from entering your garden and homes and fowling them.  The people who own these cats should be fined if their cats are found roaming the streets.  The owners of theses cats bought them for themselves and other people shouldnt have to suffer from these unwanted animals and clean up after them too.
